item.title: Find me writeup | web-lab hacksec
item.description: Web-Lab information Find ME Point: 30+ Level: MEDIUM Target: http://machine4.hacksec.in First ownby: H3X1337 Created by: SCRIPT1337X let’s start First of all, let’s see what we have to work on by opening the URL. Reconnaissance Ok so now we start our reconnaissance, first we try to find all the hidden folders of the website using Dirb with default wordlist common.
